snippet: LEAD: In a cramped trailer under the Democratic National Convention hall, Tad Devine, chief delegate tracker for Michael S. Dukakis, is running the nominating vote like a computer-age conductor: with a radio headset instead of a baton....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: In a cramped trailer under the Democratic National Convention hall, Tad Devine, chief delegate tracker for Michael S. Dukakis, is running the nominating vote like a computer-age conductor: with a radio headset instead of a baton.

headline.main: The Democrats in Atlanta; For Trackers, Timing Is Everything

byline.original: By ANDREW ROSENTHAL, Special to the New York Times
